column4: hello, i got a little question. i am on a windows pc right now and i have an ubuntu server at home. i have access via ssh but i wuld like to vnc it.. unfortunately, i forgot to open port 5900 on my router. is it possible to open mozilla via ssh and transfer that window on my windows computer? i heard, that is possible somehow :S
hmm ActionParsnip could you help me a bit with that, i am not that much into linux
you'll need a xserver on windows for that running
